** 26 外物第二十六

比干戮，¶
箕子狂，¶
惡來死，¶
桀紂亡。¶

生火甚多，眾人焚和，¶	KR5c0126_026:1a:27:1:3,KR5i0036_005:05p001b:7:8:1
月固不勝火，¶	KR1j0076_010:12b:2:11:6,KR2b0017_074:21b:8:19:1,KR2c0021_112:41b:8:15:1,KR3a0059_038:35b:4:14:8,KR3j0038_025:7a:7:18:11,KR3k0025_001:22a:7:17:9,KR3k0055_364:20a:3:4:5,KR4d0076_031:7a:2:12:6,KR4d0077_031:7a:3:12:6,KR4d0080_055:11b:8:3:23,KR4d0081_038:20b:6:3:75,KR4e0164_015:20b:4:13:39,KR4h0022_884:7a:6:14:3,KR4i0043_001:9b:6:10:1,KR5c0051_009:2a:7:1:0,KR5c0126_026:1a:28:1:3,KR5c0127_085:001b:3:1:2,KR5c0128_027:002b:7:1:2,KR5c0135_025:001b:7:17:4,KR5c0136_015:001b:6:1:3,KR5c0138_009:2a:3:10:1,KR5c0139_028:004b:1:1:7,KR5h0057_006:050b:10:5:54,KR5i0036_005:05p001b:8:3:1
於是乎有僓然而道盡。	KR2b0017_074:22a:1:3:1,KR2c0021_112:41b:8:20:1,KR5c0126_026:1a:29:1:3,KR5c0127_085:001b:3:6:2,KR5c0135_025:001b:8:6:4,KR5c0136_015:001b:6:6:3,KR5c0138_009:2a:3:27:1,KR5c0139_028:004b:5:1:7,KR5i0036_005:05p001b:8:8:1

死何含珠為！』¶	KR1d0051_095:23b:5:5:15,KR1j0076_003:15a:5:35:8,KR2c0021_112:42b:3:4:1,KR3j0015_003:2b:2:35:3,KR3j0050_002:18a:3:1:0,KR3k0003_084:8b:1:4:2,KR3k0012_838:7a:8:10:6,KR3k0012_999:7a:8:10:16189,KR3k0039_002:36b:7:3:2,KR3k0055_183:18b:8:41:11,KR3k0055_400:27a:4:11:15,KR3k0056_040:52a:6:12:10,KR3k0056_175:25b:7:14:2,KR3k0058_129:6a:3:27:2,KR3k0058_131:4a:1:30:2,KR4c0014_002:31a:5:34:31,KR4c0076_002:35a:2:12:42,KR4d0074_047:18a:4:39:63,KR4d0077_010:7a:5:22:20,KR4d0077_022:26b:6:11:59,KR4d0080_018:20a:7:21:39,KR4h0066_010:10b:3:16:6,KR4h0107_009:8b:8:13:42,KR5c0126_026:4a:12:1:12,KR5c0138_009:3b:1:6:1

擪其顪，¶

老萊子之弟子出薪，¶	KR2c0021_083:54b:1:3:1,KR3k0049_021:80b:7:21:10,KR3k0058_123:6a:4:8:2,KR5c0126_026:4a:18:1:13,KR5c0136_015:004a:2:1:5,KR5c0138_009:3b:5:23:1,KR5c0139_028:009a:4:1:11,KR5h0057_006:053a:3:1:56,KR5i0036_005:05p003a:2:12:1,KR5i0036_005:05p008a:4:13:1,KR6q0219_003:0049a:2:1:196
遇仲尼，¶

「是丘也。¶
召而來。」¶

# src: ZHUANG 26.5.3 Guo Qingfan 929; Wang Shumin 1060 ; Fang Yong 742; Chen Guying 711
# dating: 8110
仲尼至。¶
曰：¶
「丘！¶
去汝躬矜與汝容知，¶	KR2c0021_083:54b:3:17:1,KR4f0060_001:81b:10:18:22,KR5c0051_009:5a:8:3:0,KR5c0126_026:4a:32:1:15,KR5c0127_086:003b:1:5:18,KR5c0128_027:006b:2:5:2,KR5c0135_025:003b:10:6:6,KR5c0136_015:004a:5:6:5,KR5c0138_009:4a:3:3:1,KR5c0139_028:010a:5:6:12,KR5h0057_006:053a:6:7:56,KR5i0036_005:05p003a:5:2:1
斯為君子矣。」¶	KR1a0113_003:60b:7:28:54,KR2c0021_083:54b:4:4:1,KR2o0018_013:13a:8:10:3,KR4d0306_043:7b:5:13:4,KR4e0124_006:16a:3:2:10,KR5c0126_026:4a:33:1:15,KR5c0138_009:4a:3:11:1

君曰：¶
「令余且會朝。」	KR5c0051_009:6b:5:4:0,KR5c0126_026:4a:67:1:23,KR5c0127_086:008a:2:9:39,KR5c0128_027:008a:9:11:2,KR5c0135_025:005a:9:16:7,KR5c0139_028:013a:10:10:15,KR5h0057_006:054a:9:11:57,KR5i0036_005:05p003b:8:7:1

余且朝。¶
君曰：¶
「漁何得？」¶

龜至，¶

卜之，¶
曰：¶
「殺龜
以卜吉。」¶
乃刳龜，¶

仲尼曰：¶
「神（龜）能見夢於元君，¶	KR1c0056_006:32a:1:21:15,KR2b0017_075:1a:5:4:1,KR2c0021_100:18a:4:5:1,KR2d0023_029:30b:3:3:42,KR3j0055_010:30b:7:12:3,KR3k0011_028:14b:4:16:5,KR3k0012_931:5a:11:3:4,KR3k0012_999:5a:11:3:17360,KR3k0025_054:17b:4:2:8,KR3k0025_099:15a:3:5:8,KR3k0049_057:8b:2:8:2,KR4a0003_006:4a:3:22:1,KR4c0006_003:14b:8:38:36,KR4d0074_001:10a:1:35:24,KR4d0080_055:28a:2:12:76,KR5c0051_009:7a:1:5:0,KR5c0126_026:4a:86:1:27,KR5c0127_086:008a:6:10:39,KR5c0128_027:008b:3:12:2,KR5c0135_025:005b:4:1:8,KR5c0136_015:005a:10:12:6,KR5c0139_028:013b:10:4:16,KR5h0057_006:054b:3:12:58,KR5i0036_005:05p004a:1:6:1,KR5i0036_005:05p008b:7:10:1

如是，則知有所困，¶	KR2b0017_075:1a:6:16:1,KR2c0021_100:18a:5:17:1,KR3k0008_098:24b:7:4:27,KR3k0049_057:8b:3:19:2,KR5c0051_009:7a:3:4:0,KR5c0126_026:4a:90:1:27,KR5c0127_086:008a:8:9:39,KR5c0128_027:008b:5:11:2,KR5c0135_025:005b:5:17:8,KR5c0136_015:005b:2:11:7,KR5c0138_009:5a:7:17:1,KR5c0139_028:014a:2:3:16,KR5h0057_006:054b:5:11:58,KR5i0036_005:05p004a:2:17:1,KR6q0157_001:0642a:22:19:314
神有所不及也。¶	KR2b0017_075:1a:7:2:1,KR2c0021_100:18a:6:3:1,KR2d0015_009:16b:1:3:1,KR2d0023_029:30b:4:21:42,KR3j0028_001:22b:3:17:0,KR3j0056_006:11b:7:12:15,KR3k0049_057:8b:4:5:2,KR4a0003_006:4a:4:4:1,KR4c0006_003:15a:1:35:36,KR4d0074_001:10a:2:29:24,KR5c0051_009:7a:3:11:0,KR5c0126_026:4a:91:1:27,KR5c0127_086:008a:8:16:39,KR5c0127_086:009b:6:14:39,KR5c0128_027:008b:6:1:2,KR5c0128_027:009a:10:3:2,KR5c0135_025:005b:6:7:8,KR5c0136_015:005b:3:1:7,KR5c0136_015:005b:8:1:7,KR5c0138_009:5a:8:3:1,KR5c0139_028:014a:2:10:16,KR5h0057_006:054b:6:1:58,KR5i0036_005:05p004a:2:24:1,KR6q0079_001:0233c:12:15:116,KR6q0157_001:0642a:23:7:314,KR6q0251_006:0318b:6:10:35

# src: ZHUANG 26.6.11 Guo Qingfan 934; Wang Shumin 1066 ; Fang Yong 746; Chen Guying 715
# dating: 8110
魚不畏網而畏鵜鶦。¶	KR5c0126_026:4a:93:1:28
去小知
而大知明，¶	KR2b0017_075:1a:8:10:1,KR2c0021_100:18a:7:7:1,KR3k0045_114:15a:4:20:3,KR5c0051_009:7b:2:4:0,KR5c0126_026:4a:94:4:28,KR5c0127_028:008b:8:5:2,KR5c0127_086:008a:10:7:39,KR5c0127_086:009a:1:9:39,KR5c0128_027:008b:7:9:2,KR5c0135_025:005b:7:15:8,KR5c0135_025:006a:3:12:8,KR5c0136_015:005b:10:3:7,KR5c0136_015:006a:6:8:7,KR5c0139_028:014b:5:4:17,KR5h0057_006:054b:7:9:58,KR5i0036_005:05p004a:5:5:1

故曰

學者之流也。¶	KR2c0021_112:43a:3:16:1,KR4h0002_003:1b:8:41:4,KR4h0002_026:38b:4:2:84,KR4h0003_002:1b:8:14:6,KR4h0003_026:42b:6:48:56,KR5c0051_009:8b:4:6:0,KR5c0067_006:007a:7:11:9,KR5c0126_026:4a:125:1:34,KR5c0127_087:001b:2:14:2,KR5c0128_027:010a:9:12:2,KR5c0135_025:006b:7:12:9,KR5c0136_015:007a:3:15:8,KR5c0138_009:6a:8:7:1,KR5c0139_028:018a:2:7:20,KR5h0057_006:055b:7:12:59,KR5i0036_005:05p004b:10:1:1

「靜然可以補病，¶	KR5c0051_009:10a:5:1:0,KR5c0126_026:12a:1:1:38,KR5c0127_088:001a:4:1:2,KR5c0128_027:014a:10:1:2,KR5c0135_025:009b:9:1:12,KR5c0136_015:008b:1:6:10,KR5c0138_009:7b:3:13:1,KR5c0139_028:023a:4:1:25,KR5h0057_006:058a:1:1:61,KR5i0036_005:05p006a:2:22:1

聖人之所以駴天下，神人未嘗過而問焉；¶

為官師，¶

# dating: 8110
